sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./Welcome.css"; import Divider from "@mui/material/Divider"; import { Clients } from "./ViewAds"; function Welcome(props) { return (

Welcome to our Ads-System Admin Dashboard

{/*

Use the navigation bar above to start navigate in app

*/}

Application capabilities

➦ Viewing relevant ads from infinte amount of client-screens

➦ RESTful api supported

➦ All data is stored in MongoDB

➦ Managing DB docs from server and client side

➦ Login authentication for admin permissions

How to use

➦ To view ads client screens, Choose one of the available screens from 'Screens' dropdown at the navbar

➦ To view all ads for admin use, Click 'All Ads' at the navbar

➦ Edit/Delete ads is available from the All-Ads admin panel

By Tomer Cohen, Guy Levy, Gili Shukrun, Shir Fogel and Omer Tati
); } export default Welcome;
